name: EnForce
overview: A 2 player only game for simultaneous vs play. You are on board two tanks and you are moving on hostile territory, where numerous enemies try to prevent you from advancing. You need to try to avoid them and try to hit them only when the indicator at the bottom of the screen indicates a high value, in order to get the highest score possible. You have 9 lives, every 3 lost will change the background screen, the game ends when you run out of time or lose all 9 lives. Difficulty increases with each level.
